page.title: 07GRIEG HALL
page.content: The Grieg hall was built in memory of Hannah Susan Grieg by her husband, who was a rich grocer.He and his wife had spent many happy times in Alcester and he wanted to show his gratitude. He set up a fund to build the hall and maintain it.He left shares of the Grieg grocer chain and when the business was taken over the shares were sold and the presant sports complex built.It is a independant sports hall and anybody can book to play one of the thirty-six games available.The games include badminton, volley-ball,tennis,roller-skating,judo ,football and various fitness courses. There are also forty clubs held there. The most popular sport is badminton.On average three hundred people use the sports centre each week.
